name: Inverting Op-Amp Amplifier
description: Classic inverting amplifier configuration using an ideal opamp. Gain is set by the ratio of feedback to input resistor.
netlist:
* Inverting Op-Amp Amplifier
.param Rin=10k
.param Rf=100k
.subckt ideal_opamp inp inn out
E1 out 0 inp inn 100k
.ends ideal_opamp
V1 in 0 dc 0 ac 1
Rin in vminus {Rin}
Rf vminus out {Rf}
X1 0 vminus out ideal_opamp
